articles.title: Magnetic North Pole Shifts in ‘Unprecedented’ Ways Never Seen Before by Scientists - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: The Earth's Magnetic North Pole is moving faster than ever before, in a way that scientists have never observed before. This unprecedented movement could have far-reaching consequences for modern navigation systems and everyday technology.
articles.content: The Earth’s North Magnetic Pole is approaching Russia at a speed never seen before, which could spell disaster for your smartphone and GPS Devices. Whats behind this unprecedented shift, and how does… [+3484 chars]
